typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	dataflowParamYear as string (toString(0)),
	dataflowParamYearEX as string
}
source(output(
		movie as integer,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as integer,
		{Rotton Tomato} as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> MovieSource
MovieSource select(mapColumn(
		movie,
		title,
		genres,
		year,
		Rating,
		{Rotten Tomato} = {Rotton Tomato}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RenameColumn
RenameColumn filter(toInteger(year) > toInteger($dataflowParamYearEX)) ~> FilterYearsBefore1950
FilterYearsBefore1950 derive(PrimaryGenres = iif(locate('|',genres) > 1, left(genres, locate('|',genres) - 1), genres)) ~> DerivePrimaryGenre
DerivePrimaryGenre window(over(PrimaryGenres,
		year),
	desc({Rotten Tomato}, true),
	RatingsRank = rank()) ~> RankMoviesByRatings
RankMoviesByRatings aggregate(groupBy(PrimaryGenres,
		year),
	AverageRating = avg(toInteger({Rotten Tomato})),
		HighestRated = first(title),
		LowestRated = last(title),
		NumberOfMovies = count()) ~> AggregateRank
AggregateRank alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> UpsertIsTrue
UpsertIsTrue sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['PrimaryGenres','year'],
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		PrimaryGenres,
		year,
		AverageRating,
		HighestRated,
		LowestRated,
		NumberOfMovies
	)) ~> SinkToAzureSQLDB
